site_title: Legends of the World of Jeddi
welcome_text: Explore the legends of the World of Jeddi.
don_paragraph_1: This site preserves and shares tales from the past. Your support keeps these archives alive.
don_paragraph_2: Donations are essential to continue and improve our work.
don_paragraph_3: Every contribution, even small, helps sustain this project.
about_intro: Legends of Jeddi is more than an imaginary world—it's a living project born of passion and sharing.
about_mission: Our mission is to create a space where imagination becomes common ground.
about_jeddi: Jeddi researches and translates ancient texts to bring them back to life.
grimoire_prologue: At the threshold of the world opens a book whose pages whisper on their own.
grimoire_intro: Here rest heroes and forgotten realms, ready to return when read.
not_available: This legend is not available in the chosen language.
missing_text: The requested page could not be found.
